text: Nushi wa kare-ra (no inori) o kikiire rare,(ose rareta). `Hontoni ware wa, anata gata no dare no hataraita hataraki mo muda ni shinaidearou. Otoko demo on'na demo, anata gata wa tagaini doshidearu. Sorede iju shita mono, furusato kara tsuiho sa reta mono, waga michi no tame ni hakugai sa re, mata funsen shite satsugai sa reta mono ni wa, ware wa kitto kare-ra kara subete no zaigo o shometsu shite, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ni haira seyou.' Koreha arra no omoto kara no hoshodearu. Arra no omoto ni koso, mottomo sugureta hosho ga aru
